text_logic_form: Find the area of the triangle $ACB$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the area of the triangle $ACB$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $CD$ is $3.4$.
The length of the line $AB$ is $7.3$.
The point $D$ lies on the line $AB$.
The line $CD$ is perpendicular to the line $AB$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, and $BC$, forming the triangle $ACB$.
